name: Diabetes
description: A disease that occurs when blood sugar is too high.

name: Stroke
description: A sudden interruption of blood flow to the brain.

name: Cancer
description: A disease in which abnormal cells divide uncontrollably.

name: Flu
description: A contagious respiratory illness caused by influenza viruses.

name: Cardiovascular diseases
description: A group of disorders of the heart and blood vessels.

name: Hypertension
description: A condition in which blood pressure is consistently too high.

name: Myocardial infarction
description: A condition in which blood pressure is consistently too high.

name: Atherosclerosis
description: A condition in which blood pressure is consistently too high.

name: Neurological disorders
description: A group of disorders of the nervous system.

name: Alzheimer's Disease
description: A progressive disease that destroys memory.

name: Parkinson's Disease
description: A nervous system disorder affecting movement.

name: Arthritis
description: Inflammation of one or more joints.

name: Respiratory diseases
description: A group of diseases that affect the lungs.

name: Asthma
description: A respiratory condition marked by spasms in the bronchi.

name: Chronic obstructive pulmonary disease (COPD)
description: A respiratory condition marked by spasms in the bronchi.

name: Pneumonia
description: A respiratory condition marked by spasms in the bronchi.
